name: Dandelion - Week 10
description:
Dandelion

A relaxed game about dandelion seeds floating on the wind.

How to Play

Use Space to blow the dandelion. Use your cursor to change the angle of the dandelion to change how you float on the wind.

Try to travel as far as possible.

Project

This is game 10 of the "Make 10 games in 10 weeks" project by Paul from Paul Makes Games. Please leave me some feedback and follow me on my social media below.

Follow the project

Twitter: https://twitter.com/PaulMakesGames
